mapper.insert: insert into bd_invitation_code (build_invitation_code, compid, ccontract_code, use_status, create_user, create_time, ContractUID) VALUES (#{buildInvitationCode}, #{compid}, #{contractDetailCode}, #{useStatus}, #{opid}, #{date}, #{contractUID})
insert into bd_bind (build_id, compid, contractUID, ccontract_code) VALUES (#{buildId}, #{compid}, #{contractUID}, #{contractDetailCode})
mapper.delete: delete from bd_bind where build_id =#{buildId} and ccontract_code =#{ccontractCode} and compid =#{compid}
mapper.select: select bd.build_invitation_code buildinvitationcode, bd.compid, bd.ccontract_code contractDetailCode, bd.create_time createtime, bd.create_user createuser, bd.use_status usestatus, bd.contractUID from bd_invitation_code bd where bd.build_invitation_code = #{buildInvitationCode}
select build_id buildId, bd.compid, bd.ccontract_code as contractDetailCode, bd.contractUID from bd_bind bd where build_id = #{buildId}
